attributes.background: Why should motorcycles pay more road tax than some cars, they take up less room (parking)  cause less congestion (in turn less pollution) and are now fitted with catalytic converters so are low emissions, a car has the ability to carry more passengers but often doesn’t

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take specific action.

We aren't sure how you would like the tax on motorcycles lowered. Road tax on motorcycles is usually lower than for cars. We aren't sure whether you would like road tax changed so it is always lower for motorcycles than cars or some other change.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly what changes you would like to see.
